name: RI_1_1_27_1_Evidence_of_Record_Entry_Decryption_Event
title: RI.1.1.27.1 Evidence of Record Entry Decryption Event (Function)
description: Maintain Evidence of Record Entry Decryption Event
purpose: Evidence of Record Entry Decryption Event includes key metadata, ensures health record integrity (and trust) and enables record audit.

statement.label: RI.1.1.27.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence when Record Entry content is decrypted.

statement.label: RI.1.1.27.1#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization where Record Entry content is decrypted.

statement.label: RI.1.1.27.1#03
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the patient who is subject of decrypted Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.27.1#04
statement.requirement: IF a user initiated a Record Entry content decryption, THEN the system SHALL capture identity of the user initiating Record Entry content decryption.

statement.label: RI.1.1.27.1#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system application which decrypted Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.27.1#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the type of Record Event trigger (i.e., decryption).

statement.label: RI.1.1.27.1#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time Record Entry content is decrypted.

statement.label: RI.1.1.27.1#08
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the location (i.e., network address) where Record Entry content is decrypted.

statement.label: RI.1.1.27.1#09
statement.requirement: IF a user initiated a Record Entry decryption, THEN the system MAY capture the rationale for decrypting Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.27.1#10
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture a sequence identifier for decrypted Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.27.1#11
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture the identifier and version of decryption Tools used for each decrypted Record Entry.

statement.label: RI.1.1.27.1#12
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture a reference (e.g., link, pointer) to pre-decrypted data for each Record Entry decryption.
